text: Nikolai Pavlovich Zhugan (; 23 February 1917 – 22 June 2017) was an Air Force Major General. He was a member of the Great Patriotic War, and Hero of the Soviet Union (1944). He was born in Kherson Governorate, Russian Empire.В Краснодаре школьники поздравили летчика Николая Жугана с Днем Победы Zhugan died on 22 June 2017 in Krasnodar, Russia at the age of 100. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1917 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Russian centenarians Category:Soviet generals Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II
title: Nikolai Zhugan
